article_title: AP: photos of Ted Cruz with gun pointed at head not intended to be negative
article_text:
Oops.

Presidential candidate Ted Cruz was shown in a series of 14 photos taken by an Associated Press photographer at a ‘Celebrate the 2nd Amendment’ event Saturday afternoon, held at a shooting range in Johnston, Iowa. Five of the photos published by AP included images of guns seen on a wall in the background so that it appeared a pistol was pointed at Sen. Cruz’s head.”

“The images were not intended to portray Sen. Cruz in a negative light.”
